name: Powell Creative, LLC
tagline: Nashville Branding, Design and Interactive Firm
description:
Powell Creative is a boutique branding design firm in Nashville, Tennessee. 
We've been developing client brands for more than 20 years. 
Our roster of services includes logo design, brand message development, website design & development, packaging design, print marketing materials design, advertising concept & execution, video production, social media management, and so much more! 
Every client offers us a new experience in brand development, and we are always excited to take on the adventure!
